name: QuickNode
highlight: We make it simple to power your blockchain applications and scale up as you grow.
summary: Blockchain infrastructure for dApps and devs. Access Avalanche, Ethereum, Solana, BSC, Polygon, Bitcoin, Optimism, Fantom, Celo, Terra, Gnosis and more via API. Infra and tools to build + scale your Web3 app. From elastic APIs and dedicated nodes, to powerful tools and analytics, we make it simple to power your blockchain applications and scale up as you grow.
